name: Maududi
text: When the Event will come to pass

name: Maududi
text: – and then there will be no one to deny its occurrence –

name: Maududi
text: (a calamitous Event) that shall turn things upside down:

name: Maududi
text: when the earth will suddenly shake with a terrible shaking,

name: Maududi
text: and the mountains will crumble

name: Maududi
text: and will scatter abroad into fine dust.

name: Maududi
text: You shall then become three groups.

name: Maududi
text: The People on the Right: and how fortunate will be the People on the Right!

name: Maududi
text: And the People on the Left: and how miserable will be the People on the Left!

name: Maududi
text: As for the Foremost, they will be the foremost!

name: Maududi
text: They shall be near-stationed (to their Lord),

name: Maududi
text: in the Gardens of Bliss.

name: Maududi
text: A throng of the ancients,

name: Maududi
text: and a few from later times.

name: Maududi
text: They (will be seated) on gold-encrusted couches,

name: Maududi
text: reclining on them, arrayed face to face;

name: Maududi
text: immortal youths shall go about them

name: Maududi
text: with goblets and ewers and a cup filled with a drink drawn from a running spring,

name: Maududi
text: a drink by which their minds will not be clouded nor will it cause drunkenness;

name: Maududi
text: they will also go about them with the fruits of which they may choose,

name: Maududi
text: and with the flesh of any fowl that they may desire to eat;

name: Maududi
text: and there shall be wide-eyed maidens,

name: Maududi
text: beautiful as pearls hidden in their shells.

name: Maududi
text: All this shall be theirs as a reward for their deeds.

name: Maududi
text: There they shall hear no idle talk nor any sinful speech.

name: Maududi
text: All talk will be sound and upright.

name: Maududi
text: As for the People on the Right, how fortunate shall be the people on the Right!

name: Maududi
text: They shall be in the midst of thornless lote trees,

name: Maududi
text: and flower-clad acacias,

name: Maududi
text: and extended shade,

name: Maududi
text: and gushing water,

name: Maududi
text: and abundant fruit,

name: Maududi
text: never-ending and unforbidden.

name: Maududi
text: They shall be on upraised couches,

name: Maududi
text: and their spouses We shall have brought them into being afresh,

name: Maududi
text: and shall have made them virgins,

name: Maududi
text: intensely loving and of matching age.

name: Maududi
text: All this will be for the People on the Right;

name: Maududi
text: a large throng from the ancients,

name: Maududi
text: and also a large throng from those of later times.

name: Maududi
text: As for the People on the Left: how miserable will be the People on the Left!

name: Maududi
text: They will be in the midst of scorching wind and boiling water,

name: Maududi
text: and a shade of thick, pitch-black smoke,

name: Maududi
text: which will neither be cool nor soothing.

name: Maududi
text: Surely they had lived before in luxury,

name: Maududi
text: and had persisted in the Great Sin.

name: Maududi
text: They used to say: “What! Once we are dead and are reduced to dust and bones, shall we still be raised to a new life from the dead?

name: Maududi
text: (We) and our fore-fathers of yore?”

name: Maududi
text: Tell them, (O Prophet): “The earlier ones and the later ones

name: Maududi
text: shall all be brought together on an appointed Day.

name: Maududi
text: Then you, the erring ones and those that gave the lie to the Truth,

name: Maududi
text: shall all eat from the Tree of al-Zaqqum,

name: Maududi
text: filling your bellies with it;

name: Maududi
text: and thereupon you shall drink boiling water,

name: Maududi
text: drinking it as thirsty camels do.”

name: Maududi
text: Thus shall they be entertained on the Day of Recompense.

name: Maududi
text: We have created you, then why would you not confirm it?

name: Maududi
text: Did you ever consider the sperm that you emit?

name: Maududi
text: Do you create a child out of it, or are We its creators?

name: Maududi
text: It is We Who ordained death upon you and We are not to be frustrated.

name: Maududi
text: Had We so wished, nothing could have hindered Us from replacing you by others like yourselves, or transforming you into beings you know nothing about.

name: Maududi
text: You are well aware of the first creation; then, do you learn no lesson from it?

name: Maududi
text: Have you considered the seeds you till?

name: Maududi
text: Is it you or We Who make them grow?

name: Maududi
text: If We so wished, We could have reduced your harvest to rubble, and you would have been left wonder-struck to exclaim:

name: Maududi
text: “We have been penalised;

name: Maududi
text: nay; we have been undone!”

name: Maududi
text: Did you cast a good look at the water that you drink?

name: Maududi
text: Is it you who brought it down from the clouds or is it We Who brought it down?

name: Maududi
text: If We had so pleased, We could have made it bitter. So why would you not give thanks?

name: Maududi
text: Did you consider the fire which you kindle?

name: Maududi
text: Did you make its tree grow or was it We Who made it grow?

name: Maududi
text: We made it a reminder and a provision for the needy.

name: Maududi
text: Glorify, then, (O Prophet), the name of your Great Lord.

name: Maududi
text: No! I swear by the positions of the stars –

name: Maududi
text: and this is indeed a mighty oath, if only you knew –

name: Maududi
text: that this indeed is a noble Qur'an,

name: Maududi
text: inscribed in a well-guarded Book,

name: Maududi
text: which none but the pure may touch;

name: Maududi
text: a revelation from the Lord of the Universe.

name: Maududi
text: Do you, then, take this discourse in light esteem,

name: Maududi
text: and your portion in it is simply that you denounce it as false?

name: Maududi
text: Why, then, when the soul leaps up to the throat,

name: Maududi
text: the while you are helplessly watching that he is on the verge of death,

name: Maududi
text: – at that moment when We are closer to him than you, although you do not see (Us)

name: Maududi
text: if you are not subject to anyone's authority,

name: Maududi
text: why are you then not able to bring them back to life if you are truthful?

name: Maududi
text: So if he is one of those who are near-stationed (to Allah),

name: Maududi
text: then happiness and delight and Gardens of Bliss are his.

name: Maududi
text: And if he is one of the People on the Right,

name: Maududi
text: he will be welcomed by the words: “Peace to you” from the People on the Right.

name: Maududi
text: And if he is one of those who give the lie (to this Message) and go astray,

name: Maududi
text: then he will be served boiling water,

name: Maududi
text: and will be scorched by the Fire.

name: Maududi
text: That indeed is the absolute truth.

name: Maududi
text: So glorify the name of your Great Lord.
